author: techbro_ccoli
content:
I'm very for standard-izing the RPC error codes. I've had issues with testing before as clients had different error messages for specific errors. 

Not sure on the best method, but having more error codes seems to be the best I can think of - otherwise clients all return specific error messages

Maybe the error code can be something like `-32602_01` so its the same error type (-32602), but the 01 specifies the specific error
